import '../App.css' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import callAPI from '../utils/apiCaller'; function Donmua() { const[order,setOrder]=useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ callAPI('order','POST',{user:sessionStorage.getItem('name')}) .then(res=>{ setOrder(res.data.orders) }) },[]) console.log(order) return ( <>
